description:
Kobayakawa Sena is a little guy who always get picked on by the bullies in school. Since elementary school, he always play the role of the errand boy to the extent that he has become swift and fast in his movements. Coincidentally, Hiruma Youichi and Kurita Ryukan are looking for a fast running back for their American Football team (Amefuto) and want to put Sena in the team. To hide their new star player from the eyes of other High Schools, Hiruma encases Sena in a Amefuto helmet with a dark visor and name him Eyeshield #21.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Today is Sena`s first day of school, and he has to decide if he is going to join the football team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kousoku no Ashi o Motsu Otoko
L`homme aux jambes rapides comme la lumière
L`uomo con le gambe della velocità della luce!
The Man with the Lightspeed Legs!

REGULAR.description:
Even though Sena does not know anything about football, he decides to join the team.
Source: crunchyroll

One of the running backs has been hurt, so Sena is sent into the game as his replacement.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blaze a Path Down the Field!
フィールドをねじふせろ

REGULAR.description:
Sena starts work outs with the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce qu`on peut attraper de la main
What I Hold in My Hands!

REGULAR.description:
Sena thinks about quitting because he does not want to play the White Knights. Kurita reminds him that he has guards around him so things will be alright.
Source: crunchyroll

Since Sena is a great runner, the Oyjo coach lets Shin play.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le spear tackle fait des ravages !
The Spear of the Spear Tackle!
炸裂! スピアタックル

REGULAR.description:
Hiruma is thinking about leaving the game early but changes his mind once he hears how badly Sena wants to win this game.
Source: crunchyroll

Even though they lost the game, Sena is happy because he outscored Shin.
Source: crunchyroll

The team needs a receiver and a catcher. They want Raimon to try out, but he is already trying out for baseball.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena, feeling guilty, goes to see Sakuraba in the hospital. Seeing how despondent Sakuraba is, Sena challenges him to be the hero he truly is.
Source: crunchyroll

While running errands for Hiruma, Sena runs into Shin, who team up to stop two thieves trying to steal from the Devil Bats.
Source: crunchyroll

The big game with Zokugaku starts with Raimon`s debut as the new wide receiver. Realizing that Deimon now has two weapons, Habashira targets Sena/Eyeshield 21, who is still frightened of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キャッチ! マックス!!

REGULAR.description:
Realizing that Habashira`s not nearly as scary as Shin can be, Sena leaves him and the Zokugaku Chameleons in his dust.
Source: crunchyroll

Recruiting new players for the team has been a snap since their win over Zokugaku, but Hiruma devises a test to separate the men from the boys.
Source: crunchyroll

Realizing that Sena`s stamina for running is under-developed, Hiruma develops an amusing way to help him work on it. Meanwhile, Mamori begins to suspect that Sena is really Eyeshield-21 and sets out to prove it.
Source: crunchyroll

Kurita becomes wrongly accused of a crime. In order to keep the Deimon Football Team from getting kicked out of the tournament for the Christmas Bowl, he withdraws from the team. Sena and the others will have to find a way to prove his innocence.
Source: crunchyroll

Hiruma tries yet another insane method of training the team, while Monta learns the importance of passing routes when the team sees Ojo nearly defeated in the spring tournament final.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キッド&アイアンホース

REGULAR.description:
After another futile practice, the WTF trio decide to quit the team. After hearing some of the Taiyou Sphinx players make fun of them, they challenge them to a fight, but are brutally defeated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fierté des bons à rien
ろくでなしのプライド

REGULAR.description:
The Devil Bats turn up at the Taiyou High School to play the Taiyou Sphinx when the Sphinx`s quarterback says that his team will totally destroy the Devil Bats in only 12 plays.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les paysans qui se moquent des challengers
The Lower Class Laughs at Its Challengers
小市民は挑戦者を笑う

REGULAR.description:
The game between the Deimon Devil Bats and the Taiyou Sphinx continues. The Devil Bats are gaining points as they begin to outsmart the Sphinx`s famous Pyramid Line. The first half ends, and Deimon is only one point behind in the score.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スフィンクスの秘密兵器

REGULAR.description:
Monta is having a difficult time trying to get past the Spinx`s cornerback, Kamaguruma. Every time Monta goes to catch the football, he is met with a "chariot bump".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 翔べ! デビルバット

REGULAR.description:
Taki Suzuna has come to Deimon High School to expose Eyeshield 21`s true identity for a newspaper article. Suzuna challenges Eyeshield 21 to a race. If Eyeshield wins,  she will leave him alone and not reveal his identity.
Source: crunchyroll

The American team accepts the game against the Deimon Devil Bats. Sena and a man called Panther each learn how fast the other is. Wanting to go up against each other, they do their best to ensure total victory for their team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`homme qui échappe à la gravité

REGULAR.description:
The NASA Aliens and the Deimon Devil Bats are ready for their game. Unless the blitz works, Deimon learns they will be deported from Japan. Can Sena use his speed to stop the tag team duo of Homer and Watts?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choc ! Le match décisif entre le Japon et les États-Unis !
Scossa! Scontro tra Giappone e Stati Uniti!

REGULAR.description:
Trailing 14-6, Deimon has managed to stop the Shuttle Pass and is slowly progressing the ball with the sweep, but Sena wants to embarrass the Aliens and allow Panther on the field. Will Panther finally get his time to shine?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La panthère noire dans sa cage

REGULAR.description:
Trailing 26-21, the NASA Aliens finally unleash Panther and their new Moonsault Formation. Shin watches eagerly as he realizes a new speedster could threaten his reign, but will either team manage to win the wager, and what will happen if both lose?
Source: crunchyroll

Hiruma drags his team out of Japan to Houston for a boot camp. On the airplane, a little girl mistakes Cerberus for her stuffed toy and lures him into a suitcase with beef jerky. Sena and the others have to find Cerberus before Hiruma finds out.
Source: crunchyroll

When Sena and Monta get lost in America, they end up at a football field where Panther learned to play. A player`s wife goes into labor. The doctor is out fishing, so Sena needs to get him before it’s too late.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アメフト・ダウンタウン

REGULAR.description:
Hiruma orders the members of Devil Bats to the beach. They come across the Seibu Wild Gunmen`s coach and Kid. They form a five-man team that will compete in a beach football game for the prize of Texas beef and $1000.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 結成・デビルガンマンズ!

REGULAR.description:
The Devil Bats are resting at the Wild Gunmen ranch. The coach has agreed to train them. Hiruma mentions that Deimon does not allow extracurricular activities after the third year, so it`s his and Kurita`s last chance for the Christmas Bowl.
Source: crunchyroll

The death march training begins. Monta and Yukimitsu must run routes while Hiruma shoots them. The defensive linemen must push a truck. Sena has to kick a rock across the whole 2000 km. Shin is hiking on Mt. Fuji every day. Panther challenges Shin.
Source: crunchyroll

The training and the heat intensify as the team treks across Texas, but when the situation continues to get rougher, it could lead to one or two people trying to quit altogether. Is this the end of the Devil Bats` training?
Source: crunchyroll

Sena accidentally kicks the rock into a motorcycle gang. Knowing that he will have to run the whole Death March again if he loses it, he runs after them and gets separated from the rest of the team.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena applies all the training from the death march in the match. When he scores the winning goal, Sena`s last opponent declares that he saw a ghost beside Sena as he ran. Suzuna`s brother didn`t make the team, and so Sena asks him to become a member of the Deimon Devil Bats.
Source: crunchyroll

Yukimitsu collapses during the run. If he does not complete the run, he will be dropped from the team.
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Bats truck gets stuck in a pothole; with one final push together as a team, Deimon overcomes the last obstacle. Arriving in Las Vegas, on the pirate boat outside Treasure Island, Doburoku confronts Sena to see if the ghost move is mastered.
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Bats return to Japan, but Hiruma informs them that Oujo lost to Shinryuuji. Speaking of Oujo, Sakuraba reaches a breaking point and seriously considers his future as a football player.
Source: crunchyroll

The Deimon Devil Bats have returned home. Hiruma must decide on the regular players. Everyone but Yukimitsu is chosen. Yukimitsu will continue to be a bench player.
Source: crunchyroll

While hiding from a group of television interviewers, Suzuna questions why Sena doesn`t tell Mamori who he is. This leads to a quick review of the previous 38 episodes. Sena tells Suzuna that he will tell Mamori his identity when he defeats his ultimate rival, Shin Seijuuro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour le Christmas Bowl
La strada per il Christmas Bowl
The Road to the Christmas Bowl!
クリスマスボウルへの道

REGULAR.description:
Kurita and the other Devil Bats learn that one loss means their entire dream will end. Once he gets home, Kurita goes into hiding, not wanting to be the cause of the Devil Bats` failure. Can the others convince him to come out?
Source: crunchyroll

Deimon are up against Amino, a school where they use medical science to increase their muscles. Sena follows Taki onto the wrong bus and ends in Nagano. Meanwhile Deimon, without their ace, must defeat Amino.
Source: crunchyroll

Chameleon Habashira Rui gives Sena a lift to the stadium on his motorcycle. In the game, Amino decides to target Monta and tackle him on offense and defense. Amino scores another touchdown and Ishimaru and Monta both score touchdowns for Deimon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: デビルバットゴースト!!

REGULAR.description:
Monta and Sena are reluctant to recruit the legendary kicker "60 yard Magnum" Musashi back onto the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 伝説の60ヤードマグナム

REGULAR.description:
Taki must pass the entrance exam to be able to play for Deimon. Suzuna tells them Taki has failed to be accepted to every single school with American football in Japan except Deimon. But Taki fails again, and Suzana leaves in frustration. As it turns out, Taki can answer the question --only if it is somehow related to American Football.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アハーハー! ボクデビュー!!

REGULAR.description:
Hiruma forbids Sena to use the Devil Bat Ghost until a real game in order to keep it a secret weapon. Meanwhile Shin and Ootawara from Oujou have begun practicing in a corporation league, the Shuuei Elephants, to better hone their skills.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Devil Bat Ghost est interdit

REGULAR.description:
Now substituting in a corporate league game, Sena and Shin finally get the rematch they`ve been wanting for so long. However, Shin is disappointed as Sena refuses to use the Devil Bat Ghost due to his previous orders from Hiruma. The Samurais are losing, as the line cannot withstand Ootawara.
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Bats witness the physical endurance and team bond of the Yuuhi Guts, their next opponents in the tournament. Hiruma says that the Devil Bats have a 99% chance of winning, but the Yuuhi Guts have a 1% chance of defeating them due to having more experience.
Source: crunchyroll

Deimon`s game against the Guts begins. Hiruma tries to put pressure on them with words about this being their last chance to go to the Christmas Bowl. However, the Guts` coach has replaced the regular players with athletes from other clubs in order to win.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle of Effort, Fortitude and Will!
Effort ! Volonté ! Un combat sans merci !
Impegno! Costanza! Un incontro a tutta potenza!
努力! 根性! 全力勝負!

REGULAR.description:
The Devil Bats meet the captain of the Hashiratani Deers, Yamamoto Onihei. The Devil Bats go watch the Deers game against the Kyoshin Poseidon in order to see the team that might become their future opponents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Argento ossidato, lo spirito della linea!
The Refined Spirit of a Lineman!

REGULAR.description:
Sena learns the truth about the "real" Eyeshield 21 from a Poseidon player, Kakei Shun. Discouraged after hearing that he may never catch up to the real Eyeshield, Sena learns from Shin that it isn`t size that matters, but an unwavering spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le courage de ne pas fuir !

REGULAR.description:
Eyeshield 21 enters the Chameleons` locker room and cuts up all their uniforms in the middle of the night. Sena said he did not do it. The Chameleons enter Deimon and try to find Eyeshield 21.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les violents Caméléons sont en danger
危うし! 最凶のカメレオン

REGULAR.description:
Chamelon and Poseidon start their game. Poseidon has a great advantage because they have tall players and the Chameleon team is not united.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! The Chameleons vs. the Poseidons!
激突! カメレオンvsポセイドン

REGULAR.description:
Sena and the Devil Bats play their game with the Dokubari Scorpions, who consider football to be just as much of a mind game as a physical one. However their captain Kanagushia failed to take into account Hiruma`s superior tactics....
Source: crunchyroll

With Hiruma MIA and the Scorpions in the lead, it looks like the Deimon team`s Christmas Bowl dreams are doomed... until Mamori remembers the game plan Hiruma entrusted to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tour de contrôle a disparu

REGULAR.description:
With the game with the Scorpions behind them, Deimon prepares to play the Kyoushin Poseidons. However they may be with out one of their linemen, Komusubi`s run away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le mur de la différence de taille

REGULAR.description:
Komusubi starts learning sumo. With his special training, he finds a way to overcome the physical difference between himself and Mizumachi and Kakei.
Source: crunchyroll

When Monta and Sena are sent to spy on the Poseidons` final practice before the game, they are caught, and Kakei tells Sena that he wants to challenge Eyeshield 21!
Source: crunchyroll

Sena and the Devil Bats start their game against Mizumachi and the Kyoushin Poseidons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le démon contre le dieu de la mer

REGULAR.description:
Sena finds it difficult to run against the Kyoushin team, so it`s up to Hiruma to lead his team down the field.
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Bats have made a comeback, the score is 14-12, and Deimon has the ball!
Source: crunchyroll

The game continues with a stalemate with both teams trying to break the trend and score, knowing that this will lean the game highly in their favor.
Source: crunchyroll

With pressure by the Devil Bats, Mizumachi and Shun conclude that it`s time to unleash the true power of the Kyoushin defense.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 戦慄! モビィディック・アンカー!!

REGULAR.description:
With the game and their tournament hopes in the balance, Sena and the Devil Bats get help from an unlikely source.
Source: crunchyroll

Riku appears and talks about his past and how Sena could run because of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appare l`uomo dalla velocità della luce!?
L`apparition d`un homme rapide comme la lumière
The Man Possessing Speed of Light Appears!?

REGULAR.description:
Hiruma takes advantage of the school`s field day to make it a training session for the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est la fête du sport au lycée Deimon !
Festa di atletica al liceo superiore Deimon!!

REGULAR.description:
Ishimaru and the track team need an extra man, so they ask Sena to help out. How will Sena keep his secret now?
Source: crunchyroll

As the time approaches for the game against the Seibu Wild Gunmen, Hiruma, Kurita, and Musashi all recall the promise they made to go to the Christmas Bowl.
Source: crunchyroll

The game with Seibu has begun and the Devil Bats are getting all they can handle from their running back, Kaitani Riku, the boy that taught Sena how to run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Prouver qui est le plus rapide

REGULAR.description:
With the triple threat of Riku, Tetsuma, and the Kid bearing down on the Devil Bats, it looks like their luck may have run out.
Source: crunchyroll

After seeing the dire straits the Deimon team is in, and a stern talking to from his father, Musashi rejoins the Devil Bats.
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, with all the Devil Bats on the field, Hiruma can unleash the true power of the Devil Bats, but will it be enough to overtake the Seibu team?
Source: crunchyroll

As the Deimon-Seibu game goes on, Sena finds out that he`s more than a match for his friend Riku and brings the Devil Bats close to victory with his Devil Bat Tornado.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierté et vitesse de la lumière

REGULAR.description:
Kid tells Hiruma that he fell directly into his trap, and that everything is always too good to be true.
Source: crunchyroll

After losing to the Seibu Gunmen, Tetsuma rescues Monta from getting Deimon suspended from playing.
Source: crunchyroll

The Bando Spiders face off against the Ojo White Knights.
Source: crunchyroll

Deimon realizes that they will need a kicker to win their game against the Bando Spiders.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena and Suzuna go to retrieve their helmets and cleats at a store where Sena sees a helmet with an eyeshield on it.
Source: crunchyroll

Mamori tries to help Sena, but Sena can`t find enough time to transform into Eyeshield 21!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux qui attendent au bout du chemin

REGULAR.description:
Before the match, Sena removes his helmet to reveal his identity to the world. Mamori accepts who Sena is. The game against the Bando Spiders begins.
Source: crunchyroll

Using a trick kick in the beginning of the game, Akaba recovers the ball and Kotaro scores a field goal.
Source: crunchyroll

The game continues to turn in the Spiders` favor, as they score yet another field goal, giving them a 20-point lead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vérité sur l`homme aux yeux rouges
The Truth of the Red Pupil

REGULAR.description:
Using a combination run with Hiruma, Sena is finally able to score a touchdown.
Source: crunchyroll

Musashi arrives just in the nick of time and scores a 45-yard field goal, and Deimon is now only behind by eleven points.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le temps a repris son cours

REGULAR.description:
With the wind`s speed increasing, passing is impossible, and Deimon is left with no other choice but to have Sena run the ball.
Source: crunchyroll

Taki begins to cause problems for the Devil Bats in the critical fourth quarter of their game against the Spiders.
Source: crunchyroll

With four minutes left in the game, the score is 36-30, Bando to Deimon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikari to Kage no Time Up
Il time up dell`ombra e della luce
Ombre et lumière d`une fin de match
Time Up of the Light and Shadow
光と影のタイムアップ

REGULAR.description:
Deimon has beaten the Spiders and are going to the Kanto Tournament, where the high-school champs of Kanto face each other to choose who will go to the Christmas Bowl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I soldati più forti di Tokyo
Les guerriers les plus forts de Tokyo

REGULAR.description:
A "halftime show" of short player-centric stories, interspersed with chibi shorts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 泥門ハーフタイムショー

REGULAR.description:
The Cream Puff Tournament is a tournament in America where 4 teams representing different continents face each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inizio! Chou a la cream cup!!
Ouverture de la coupe choux à la crème
開幕! シュークリームカップ!!

REGULAR.description:
Panther and a couple of the Devil Bats play a street game against a rival neighborhood to help Panther regain his love of football.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena takes up wrestling in order to try to defeat Ivan`s mammoth tackle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`esprit combattif ! L`ascension de la mort
闘魂! デス・クライム

REGULAR.description:
The Huh-Huh brothers take on a bull in order to train for the Creme Puff Cup.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I 3 fratelli della fattoria del Texas
Les trois frères dans un ranch du Texas
テキサス牧場の三兄弟

REGULAR.description:
Devil Bats vs. Savanna Survivors. In the end, the Devil Bats easily win.
Source: crunchyroll

Devil Bats vs Blizzards. Trailing 17-0 after the first half, the Blizzards send in their secret weapon to injure Sena.
Source: crunchyroll

0-17 Blizzard to Deimon. Ivan`s twin brother Wan has been placed on the field with current goals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brisez le mur de la tempête de neige !
Destroy the Wall of Snow Storm
Distruggi il muro della tempesta di neve
吹雪の壁をぶちやぶれ

REGULAR.description:
Recap of the Fall Tournament
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Allez ! Sus au tournoi du Kanto !

REGULAR.description:
The challenge to the Death Game has started. The first team to play against are the Hashiratani Deers. Kurita must face up to defeat his long time hero Onihei.
Source: crunchyroll

Game 2 of the Death Game.
Source: crunchyroll

Deimon has a school festival, where a large contest is being held.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est la fête de l`école au lycée Deimon
La festa del liceo superiore Deimon!!

REGULAR.description:
Sena starts having nightmares about football.
Source: crunchyroll

The regional champions go to a place where they decide which regional teams will play against who for the Christmas Bowl.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena, Monta, and Suzuna visit Mizumachi in the hospital.
Source: crunchyroll

Kyoshin and Bando team up to beat Deimon in the 3rd death game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il double stopper del muro di ferro
鉄壁のダブルストッパー

REGULAR.description:
In the fourth death game against the Taiyo Spinx, Deimon is left short-handed after Jumonji gets arrested for beating up some punks who were harassing a young girl.
Source: crunchyroll

Deimon vs. the NASA Aliens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ultime match du jeu de la mort

REGULAR.description:
An interview with Hiruma and Agon. Later, Sena protects Mamori from Agon.
Source: crunchyroll

A recap of the Shinryuji and Hiruma, Kurita, and Musahi`s involvement.
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Bats are given a night cruise on a ship to relax before the game.
Source: crunchyroll

Monta battles Ikkyu in a catching battle. Monta loses but vows to beat Ikkyu next time with 100% effort.
Source: crunchyroll

Unsei explains to Sena and the others why he trains so hard.
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, the match with Shinryuji is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出陣! デビルバッツ!

REGULAR.description:
The game begins. Shinryuji gets the lead on Deimon.
Source: crunchyroll

The first half ends with 32-0, Shinryuji in the lead.
Source: crunchyroll

Hiruma tells Sena that he has to blitz Agon on every play, but it just does not seem to work.
Source: crunchyroll

At the beginning of the episode Shin comments that even though each individual in Deimon is lacking, as a team they are already regarded as the strongest in Kanto, hinting the result of the game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel pour le titre de numéro un
Il number one è in trappola
ナンバーワンを懸けて

REGULAR.description:
Sena grabs the ball and is about to score a touchdown when Agon gets in the way.
Source: crunchyroll

58 seconds remain on the clock with the score at 35-28.
Source: crunchyroll

It turns out that before Monta was tackled down, he reached his hand out and grabbed the grass on the "out of bounds area,"
Source: crunchyroll

After winning the game, the players line up to shake hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To the Limits of the Death Battle

REGULAR.description:
The Hakushu Dinosaurs will play against the Taiyo Sphinx.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 超弩級! ダイナソーズ!!

REGULAR.description:
Seibu Wild Gunmen vs. Misaki Wolves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le champ de bataille du loup

REGULAR.description:
Riku loses his cool and gets angry at the Wolves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ロデオドライブ・スタンピード

REGULAR.description:
As a celebration of their progress, Mamori decides to buy Sena and Riku new shoes.
Source: crunchyroll

Ojo White Knights vs. Sado Strong Golems!
Source: crunchyroll

Hiruma and the rest of the team go to spy on Ojo at their high school festival while Hiruma, Kurita, and Musashi get trapped doing a quiz show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est la fête de l`école au lycée Ojô !

REGULAR.description:
Torakichi realizes that Sakuraba`s not the ace of Ojo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il giuramento per diventare un asso

REGULAR.description:
A few days before the game between Deimon and Ojo, Hiruma takes the team on a helicopter trip to remind them where Ojo is weakest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ただ, 勝利のために

REGULAR.description:
The two teams` catchers and running backs are interviewed the day before the match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demone vs l`uomo della velocità della luce
Devil vs Man with Speed of Light
Le démon contre l`homme à la vitesse de la lumière

REGULAR.description:
It`s the match between the Ojo White Knights and Deimon Devil Bats!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle between Ojo and Deimon has started, and Deimon gets to attack first.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 開戦のファンファーレ

REGULAR.description:
Ikari makes his debut play.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怒りのプリズンチェーン

REGULAR.description:
Monta catches all the passes of Hiruma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il cavaliere che controlla il cielo
The Knight who Commands the Sky

REGULAR.description:
The Bats are on their fourth down and 40 yards away from the goal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 王国の巨大弓[バリスタ]

REGULAR.description:
Takami once again tells Deimon which direction he will running The Ballista.
Source: crunchyroll

Shin stops the passing game of Deimon forcing them to use Sena.
Source: crunchyroll

Having achieved the speed of light as well, Shin declares himself the winner off the battle between him and Sena.
Source: crunchyroll

Hiruma and Mamori review the game`s footage to find a strategy.
Source: crunchyroll

Sena uses a speed-boost to compete in power with Shin who knocks him away with some effort, giving Hiruma the chance to tackle the runner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille sur le terrain après la pluie
Terreno di battaglia passata la pioggia

REGULAR.description:
The episode begins with Ojo throwing a long pass. Monta intercepts it without turning around to watch the ball.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakuraba attempts the Devil Backfire but fails and makes a nasty fall losing consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll
